---------------------------------------------------
This prefrab is made by: 

HellRaisedSurfer
---------------------------------------------------

Video:
<object width="560" height="340"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/FKOBfnfV3Ss&hl=da_DK&fs=1&color1=0x402061&color2=0x9461ca"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/FKOBfnfV3Ss&hl=da_DK&fs=1&color1=0x402061&color2=0x9461ca" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true" width="560" height="340"></embed></object>

---------------------------------------------------
The System:

The system is pretty simple and 
contains:
- 12 triggers
- 4 Logic Compares
- 4 Weapons
- 1 logic_timer
- 1 func_rotating
- 1 func_physbox
- 1 Func_button
- 1 func_template

Explained:
A physbox is placed in the middle
of the arrows, the physbox will
now change the value of the logics
(compares) everytime it enter 
the compares zone (comp1: p228,
comp2: ak, comp3: m4, comp4: awp)

the func_button will start the 
rotator and enable the timer, 
when the timer stops it will do the
following things:
- stop wheel
- Compare values

if the value is = (equal to compare 
value) it will release the 
func_template's forcespawn input

(OnEqualTo, Name of Func_Template,
 ForceSpawn)

---------------------------------------------------
Issues:

Missing spawns: some lags and fails
in calculating the zones will
happen, this issue will be fixed in
a later version when i found a more
reliable camparisation methode
---------------------------------------------------

More Info:

Roulette time: 5-10sec (can be
changed by editing min/max in
the logic_timer)

%'s: Not above 2.5 (got a few %
'cuz of no improvements)

Idea to it: I got the idea after
a discussion on SolidSurf with some
different ideas of the system
so i created mine and figured out a
counter system.)
---------------------------------------------------
Version: BETA 1.0
---------------------------------------------------


PS: Looking for 4 textures

containing a concrete texture
for each face
(with 1 weapon on each)

P228
AWP
Ak47
M4A1



Free to use just remember to Credit
